name: The Catacombs (Torazia_JP)
description:
In this single player maze game, the player must navigate through a ruined pyramid that holds ancient treasures. The player begins outside of the ruined pyramid and must descend down the pyramid’s maze to collect the most valuable treasure while avoiding ancient monsters and traps.
